abstract: MoneyGram International is not alone in being skeptical about Euronet Worldwide‘s unsolicited $1.65 billion takeover bid. Euronet’s own shareholders seem to be pessimistic about the deal, and so is Tony Wible, an analyst at Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: MoneyGram International is not alone in being skeptical about Euronet Worldwide‘s unsolicited $1.65 billion takeover bid. Euronet’s own shareholders seem to be pessimistic about the deal, and so is Tony Wible, an analyst at Citigroup.

headline.main: Euronet Gets an Earful on MoneyGram Offer
